name: The Rogue Hero
description:
Enjoy creating countless combinations of unique skills all designed to help you survive. Will you be ready?

Rush forth on an unforgettable adventure that you won’t forget!


■ Game Features
- Log-like scrolling action game!
- Collect various gems and upgrade them.
- You can make your unique hero by choosing different gems!
- If you use 4 gems of the same rank, you enter boss mode.
- Comfortable controls
- Constantly updating!


■ Notes
- Please be careful that the data will be initialized when replacing the terminal or deleting game.


Kill monsters. Improve your hero!
